description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军大校，曾任宁德军分区副司令员，现任福州警备区副司令员。
description.en: A senior colonel in the People's Liberation Army, former deputy commander of the Ningde Military Sub-district, and current deputy commander of the Fuzhou Garrison.

description.zh-cn: 谢文华的出生地，位于安徽省。
description.en: Xie Wenhua's birthplace, located in Anhui Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的武装力量。
description.en: The armed forces of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军军衔，介于少将和上校之间。
description.en: A military rank in the People's Liberation Army, between Major General and Colonel.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在福州市的军事单位。
description.en: A military unit of the People's Liberation Army in Fuzhou.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在宁德市的军事单位。
description.en: A military unit of the People's Liberation Army in Ningde.

description.zh-cn: 负责宁德市征兵工作的机构。
description.en: The office responsible for conscription in Ningde City.

description.zh-cn: 宁德市的地方国家权力机关。
description.en: The local state power organ of Ningde City.

description.zh-cn: 福建省的地方国家权力机关。
description.en: The local state power organ of Fujian Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.
Xie Wenhua is from Guichi, Anhui.

description.zh-cn: 谢文华在中国人民解放军服役。
description.en: Xie Wenhua serves in the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 谢文华持有中国人民解放军大校军衔。
description.en: Xie Wenhua holds the military rank of Senior Colonel in the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 谢文华现任福州警备区副司令员。
description.en: Xie Wenhua is the current deputy commander of the Fuzhou Garrison.

description.zh-cn: 谢文华曾担任宁德军分区副司令员。
description.en: Xie Wenhua previously served as the deputy commander of the Ningde Military Sub-district.

description.zh-cn: 谢文华在担任宁德军分区副司令员期间，兼任宁德市征兵办公室主任。
description.en: While serving as the deputy commander of the Ningde Military Sub-district, Xie Wenhua concurrently held the position of Director of the Ningde Conscription Office.

description.zh-cn: 2020年，被补选为宁德市第四届人大代表，后当选宁德市第五届人大代表。
description.en: In 2020, he was by-elected as a deputy to the 4th Ningde Municipal People's Congress, and was later elected as a deputy to the 5th Ningde Municipal People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 谢文华是福建省第十四届人大代表。
description.en: Xie Wenhua is a deputy to the 14th Fujian Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 根据维基百科分类，谢文华是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to Wikipedia categories, Xie Wenhua is a member of the Communist Party of China.
